CustomField.description: If the Timesheet was approved on Behalf of the Approver, this field indicates that an email will be sent to the Approver to notify them of the approval
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the Timesheet was approved on Behalf of the Approver, this field indicates that an email will be sent to the Approver to notify them of the approval
CustomField.label: Approved on Behalf Notify Approver
